snippet.title: Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders l Pre-Order Trailer l Microids & Artefacts Studio
snippet.description:
Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders will be released in Europe the 4th of February on PC/MAC, PS4 and XBOX ONE (boxed and digital versions)

Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders will be released in USA the 23rd of February on PC/MAC, PS4 and XBOX ONE (boxed and digital versions)

Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders will be available worldwide the 4th of February on Steam

Pre-order it now for on steam for a 20% discount http://store.steampowered.com/app/374900/
